title: Bug 6322 - All Types Dialog Shows Obfuscated Classes
description: The bug report addresses an issue where the 'All Types' dialog displays obfuscated classes from JDK 1.4, including 'a,' 'a1,' 'b,' 'c,' 'd,' etc.
OB: The observed behavior is that obfuscated classes are prominently listed in the 'All Types' dialog.
EB: The expected behavior is that obfuscated classes should be less prominent in the 'All Types' dialog.
SR: The bug report suggests two potential solutions: a) sorting lowercase class names after those starting with a capital letter, and b) filtering out obfuscated classes completely. The author of the report recommends option a) as the preferred solution.
